attributes.additional_details:
WE DEMAND THAT ALL MP's ARE ALLOWED A FREE VOTE ON A TIMETABLE FOR A "LEAVE THE EC NOW" REFERENDUM.

DEMOCRACY DOES NOT EXIST IN A COUNTRY WHERE THE OVERWHELMING MAJORITY DEMAND THE RIGHT TO A VOTE ON A MATTER THAT IS DESTROYING OUR COUNTRY AND WAY OF LIFE BUT ARE DENIED THIS RIGHT BY POLITICAL LEADERS WHO ARM TWIST MP's, TO VOTE AS INSTRUCTED AND TO IGNORE THE WISHES OF THE PEOPLE WHO ELECTED THEM. - REMEMBER THE IRISH REPUBLIC ? - THEY WERE MADE TO KEEP VOTING UNTIL THE GOVERNMENT GOT THE ANSWER THEY WANTED !!! - STAND UP - WE ARE THE GOVERNMENT - FORCE THEM TO FOLLOW YOUR WISHES - DEMAND YOUR RIGHT TO A VOTE .

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government
